description: Begin with 2n cards in n piles of 2, the piles being {1,1},{2,2},{3,3},...,{n,n}. How many transpositions of adjacent (single) cards are needed to reverse the order of the piles?
references: Graham Brightwell, Michael Littman and Peter Winkler (pw(AT)research.bell-labs.com), unpublished.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
